resources.string: Libraries usages \n Retrofit,Gson,Glide, Room(Architecture component),Otto bus.
\t This app is designed to let the users to explore on all movies. Totally you can see the budget, revenue and movie overview etc . . in each movies. Also you can watch almost every movie trailers.
Basically this screen is created to be easily seen about Top rated, Popular, Now playing and Upcoming movies.
This screen will be coming soon.
This screen is born to show you your recent movie list. So you can never be missing your recent actions.
The menu screen\'s purpose is to make direct searching to all movies, credits and about app.
